value.title: DAX Fridays! #126: Understand the Formula Engine and Storage Engine to optimize your DAX queries
value.excerpt: To be able to optimize DAX queries, you need to know how the formula engine and the storage engine work with them, so how about we let them explain themselves? #curbal #powerbi #dax #DAXFridays  Hope you enjoy the video, i had fun doing it :)  Have you missed the Vertipaq series? value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.  In today's video, I am going to show you two ways to do it with DAX  and power query that get the closest to the actual age.  Do you know any other method to calculate age? Share it in the comments!
